thread.title: Front Row Is Looking for a Head of Engineering and a Head of Product
thread.title_full: Front Row Is Looking for a Head of Engineering and a Head of Product

title: Front Row Is Looking for a Head of Engineering and a Head of Product
text:
About Front Row Education 
We believe every classroom should have access to top-quality instructional material. 
Education today is not an equitable resource: schools across the country offer drastically different levels of educational resources and support. No student’s outcomes should be subject to this lottery system - when students are given inferior resources, they’re much more likely to fall behind & stay behind for their entire academic career. 
Front Row provides students with the means to not only stay on track, but to actively develop the skills they need to be motivated, self-starting learners for their entire lives. We arm teachers with the data they need to support every student individually, and we provide students with the skills they need to take control of their education. 
If you’re passionate about the same things we are, we want to hear from you! 
More about us:
